Articles.Content:
Download here. --> Ultimate Rover

Instruction:-

1) Press the "Break" on top of your screen.

2) Press "1" to release the rover.

3) EVA your crew. Move them near to the rover.

4) Right click on the External Command Module (chair). And seat them in.

5) Repeat till all the crew aboard or you can just skip that. Or switch to rover.

6) Rock and Roll.

Features:-

1) Roll as you like. 360" turn proof and 12 seats.

2) Anti-flip system <---(This is pattern by Sirine...that's me). Press "G"...

3) Fun, to try to break it.

Edited September 3, 2013 by Sirine
Add in Press "G" to turn it back.

And you CAN repair the damage wheel by just Right Click on it!

Much like repack the parachute.
